x 287 67 673 74 0 28 This is an electronic circuit.
x 291 101 643 107 0 24 It's a network of components,
x 290 132 700 138 0 24 powered by a battery (on the left).
129 672 208 624 224 0 10
x 686 207 917 213 0 24 The yellow dots are
x 685 236 800 242 0 24 electrons.
x 686 274 952 280 0 24 When electrons move,
x 687 301 947 307 0 24 we call that "current".
130 933 329 688 448 0
x 710 380 905 386 0 24 Current is a flow
x 739 408 884 414 0 24 of electrons.
